text: The Voice of the Violin is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Marion Leonard, and Frank Powell. ==Actors== *Arthur V. Johnson - Herr von Schmidt *Marion Leonard - Helen Walker *Frank Powell - Mr. Walker *David Miles (actor) - Communist Leader ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Voice of the Violin (movie)
